line.comment: * Task 0.
* Mordan2
* first check for Hot Drop target, then defend our base.
* 50% chance to look for a new Freighter, Fighter, or Merc leader.
* if no target, find any freighters (freighter = [TS] and [TP]
* Mordan2 add - look for TL's also.
* Mordan2 change from 2.5% to 10%
* if no target, 10% chance to look for a fighter
* Mordan3 Add a high chance a Pirate will go after a player owned jump beacon at hard difficulty level.
* Mordan8 - Increased chances from 50 to 80% that a pirate will attack ANY beacon. Also extended the search range to 2x their scanner range. Pirates hate spies.

line.text: 'A Filthy Scum laden Pirate has spotted your jump beacon in '

line.comment: * if no target, 1.7% chance to attack a merc
* Engage mercenaries.
* Small chance to lay in wait until the target undocks again.
* Not sure this works well.
* 5% chance it will not move.
* If I found a valid target above
* Found a Yaki.. Ignore them.
* go to a new position to search for a new target or move to another sector
* we dont immediately move to another sector because there could be other targets here
* goto label Move:
* Found a player ship or in a player sector that has some infamy. The more infamy they have, the higher chance we will just move onto a different sector and not harass them.
* Am in a sector with an active Pirate Contract perk, so move to another sector.
* Mordan9
* $outpostType = [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.GetOutpostType' : race=$owner
* $outpost = find station: sector=[SECTOR] class or type=$outpostType race=$owner flags=0 refobj=null maxdist=0 maxnum=1 refpos=null
* Herobetty 5.4: Pirate contract is void if the player joins the OCV.
* ZH2.0 - we dont need to attack terraformers if the sector is protected by the Phanon stealth ability
* go to a new position to search for a new target or move to another sector
* target found is valid, so go shoot it.
* MordanB - Chance for Pirates to now Claim abandoned ships!
* Look for any Abandoned Ships within Range before moving onto a new location. There is not restriction on size.
* Mordan2
* We want to move around and scan more in this sector before we move on.
* move to another spot in-sector and re-scan. Note, we only re-scan in a sector once for a total of 2 scans.
* Retry scan again at this new spot in this system.
* Move to another sector.

sval.val: A Filthy Scum laden Pirate has spotted your jump beacon in
Pirate contract
set by Mayhem.Task.Pirate.Harassment.TM
Task 0.
Mordan2
first check for Hot Drop target, then defend our base.
50% chance to look for a new Freighter, Fighter, or Merc leader.
if no target, find any freighters (freighter = [TS] and [TP]
Mordan2 add - look for TL's also.
Mordan2 change from 2.5% to 10%
if no target, 10% chance to look for a fighter
Mordan3 Add a high chance a Pirate will go after a player owned jump beacon at hard difficulty level.
Mordan8 - Increased chances from 50 to 80% that a pirate will attack ANY beacon. Also extended the search range to 2x their scanner range. Pirates hate spies.
if no target, 1.7% chance to attack a merc
Engage mercenaries.
Small chance to lay in wait until the target undocks again.
Not sure this works well.
5% chance it will not move.
If I found a valid target above
Found a Yaki.. Ignore them.
go to a new position to search for a new target or move to another sector
we dont immediately move to another sector because there could be other targets here
goto label Move:
Found a player ship or in a player sector that has some infamy. The more infamy they have, the higher chance we will just move onto a different sector and not harass them.
Am in a sector with an active Pirate Contract perk, so move to another sector.
$outpostType = [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.GetOutpostType' : race=$owner
$outpost = find station: sector=[SECTOR] class or type=$outpostType race=$owner flags=0 refobj=null maxdist=0 maxnum=1 refpos=null
Herobetty 5.4: Pirate contract is void if the player joins the OCV.
ZH2.0 - we dont need to attack terraformers if the sector is protected by the Phanon stealth ability
go to a new position to search for a new target or move to another sector
target found is valid, so go shoot it.
MordanB - Chance for Pirates to now Claim abandoned ships!
Look for any Abandoned Ships within Range before moving onto a new location. There is not restriction on size.
We want to move around and scan more in this sector before we move on.
move to another spot in-sector and re-scan. Note, we only re-scan in a sector once for a total of 2 scans.
Retry scan again at this new spot in this system.
Move to another sector.
